member.summary: Canvas class that draws shapes and text for the BOOSE program

member.summary: Creates a new canvas with the given width and height.

member.summary: Current X position of the pen.

member.summary: Current Y position of the pen.

member.name: P:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.PenColour
member.summary: Current colour of the pen.

member.summary: Changes the size of the canvas.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.SetColour(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the pen colour using red, green and blue values.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the pen to a new position without drawing.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.DrawTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a line from the current pen position to a new position.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Clear
member.summary: Clears the canvas to grey.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Reset
member.summary: Resets the pen position and colour to their starting values.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Circle(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a circle with the current pen position as the centre.
member.param: True to fill the circle, false to only draw the outline.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Rect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a rectangle at the current pen position.

member.name: M:BOOSEprogram1.BOOSEcanvas.Tri(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a simple triangle based on the current pen position.

member.summary: Draws a piece of text at the current pen position.

member.summary: Returns the bitmap so it can be shown on the form.
